titleStmt.title: The Drunkard forewarned and the swearer caution'd in a late judgement on the body of Dowee Sitses sent in a letter from Theodorus Paludamus ... to the Lady Habuerin : published for the information of some, and premonition to others, to lead a more pious life.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
